name: Somos
headline: Internet for the urban developing world.
description: We use cutting-edge radio tech operating in unlicensed spectrum to rapidly build fiber-quality networks (1Gbps ) in the urban developing world.

founders.name: Forrest Heath, Founder
founders.description: I build internet infrastructure in the developing world.

## Internet
## +
## TV vía Streaming
Plataforma diseñada para que puedas ver TV en vivo a través de una conexión a internet. Más de 90 canales en hasta 5 dispositivos + 1 TV Box* por sólo $20.000* adicionales 
*Los canales y señales de TV ofrecidos a través de Somos TV, son emitidos por PlussTV, Somos es exclusivamente el medio de emisión.
*TV Box sujeto a disponibilidad
*Disponible en Bogotá a partir de marzo de 2025.
[¡Lo quiero con TV!](http://somosinternet.co/<https:/somosinternet.com/booking?utm_medium=organico&utm_source=website>)
[Ver lista de canales](http://somosinternet.co/<https:/www.somosinternet.co/lista-de-canales>)
![router internet fibra optica hogar](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/024a55_488a28878c1a424fa10304dd211fd57c~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_82,h_82,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/Recurso%201_4x.png)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Somos**

**Founded:** 2019  
**Location:** Medellín, Colombia  
**Website:** [somosinternet.co](http://somosinternet.co)

**Mission:**  
Somos is on a bold mission to provide fast internet access to the urban developing world. The company aims to bridge the gap in internet connectivity within Latin America and beyond, leveraging cutting-edge technology to ensure that quality internet is within everyone’s reach.

**What They Do:**  
Originally conceived to utilize advanced radio technology operating within unlicensed spectrum, Somos has built a robust infrastructure that provides fiber-quality internet networks with impressive speeds of up to 1Gbps. They focus on creating sustainable and affordable connectivity solutions tailored to various customer needs. Currently, they offer no-commitment subscriptions that are accessible and adaptable, allowing individuals and organizations to connect without lengthy contracts.

**Team:**  
Somos employs around 250 dedicated professionals who are committed to enhancing the digital landscape. Their operational expertise allows them to rapidly deploy solutions and manage customer needs efficiently.

**Funding & Growth:**  
Somos is one of the promising new startups from the Y Combinator W21 batch, having secured $13.4 million in seed funding. This capital boosts their capability to expand services and improve customer experience significantly.

**Market Positioning:**  
As a key player in the telecommunications sector across Latin America, Somos is focused on not just providing a service but creating an ecosystem for digital inclusion. Their approach is centered on user-friendly experiences, including straightforward pricing and 30 days of free trial services.

**Plans & Pricing:**  
They offer various plans starting from cost-effective options suitable for both home and office users, emphasizing transparency and no hidden fees. This affordable pricing structure encourages more households and businesses to uptake reliable internet services.

**Customer Experience:**  
With 24/7 customer support and personalized installation processes, Somos ensures that users receive adequate assistance and tailored services fitting their spaces and usage patterns. They pride themselves on using human teams for customer service, emphasizing a personal touch rather than automated responses.

In summary, Somos is more than just an internet service provider; they’re a transformative force in Latin America’s tech landscape, bringing high-speed internet to areas that need it most. They blend technology, innovation, and customer-centric services to foster connectivity and empower communities across the urban developing world.
